## Government of Canada Tender Announcement
=====================================

### EV385-232043 - Canadian High Arctic Research Station (CHARS) Mechanical Work Package ‘B’

### Request for Proposal
======================

#### Notice # RFP

* **Tender Reference Number:** WS3924062506-Doc3924130973
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3924062506
* **Publication Date:** April 3, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 16, 2023 at 14:00 EDT

#### Invitation to Bid
----------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PPSC) invites qualified firms to submit bids for the Canadian High Arctic Research Station (CHARS) Mechanical Work Package 'B'.  This request for proposal is for a mechanical engineering firm to act as the prime consultant with a multi-disciplinary team of sub-consultants.

### Description
------------

This procurement falls under the United Nations Standard Products and Services Code (UNSPSC) 81101600: Mechanical Engineering. The contracting entity is seeking a consultant to deliver services to support this project.

### Evaluation Criteria
----------------***/

A combined assessment of technical merit and price will be used to evaluate proposals. Responses will be evaluated based on ability, experience, and proposal price.

### Submission Requirements
-------------------------

All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by May 16, 2023 at 14:00 EDT.

### Additional Information
----------------------

The current status of this tender is CANCELLED.
